titleEn: LeCun Bets His Later Years, Declaring Large Models Doomed, While Hassabis Vows to Scale to the End
descriptionEn: Recently, Turing Award winner Yann LeCun criticized the mainstream AI approach in Silicon Valley, calling the pursuit of AGI through large models "nonsense." DeepMind founder Demis Hassabis argued that LeCun confused the concepts of "general-purpose intelligence" and "general intelligence." The debate between these two top scientists reflects the directional choices for AI in the next five to ten years.

titleEn: Microsoft Sounds the "Red Alert," Nadella Returns to the Front Lines to Fix Bugs, Cannot Afford to Lose the AI Battle
descriptionEn: The trillion-dollar-worth Nadella transforms into a "Junior Product Manager"! Microsoft controls all the entry points, yet users are fleeing, turning a winning hand into a complete mess. Behind this undignified self-rescue lies a giant's reckoning with "AI arrogance": compared to an all-knowing tutor, what we truly need is a partner who knows the boundaries and doesn't intrude.
